title: [RIP-57] Add example tiered storage backend service provider
description:
link to #5754

As stated in the title, this issue aims to add a POSIX provider for tiered storage. It transfers message data from the default store directory to the mount point of storage medium for tiered storage. This provider is fully functional but for demonstration purposes only.
